definitions.title: n.[m.]
definitions.body: entire removal (redupl. intens. (Ges:§ 30 n. Sta:§ 124 a), abstr., √ [[[עזל]]] = Ar. 9zl remove, v. Bähr:Symb. ii. 668 Win:ii. 659 ff. Me Schenkel:BL. i. 256; > most, n. pr. of spirit haunting desert, Thes Di Dr:Hastings, DB [a fallen angel, Le 16:8 ff. being late, acc. to Che:ZAW xv (1895), 153 ff., Ency. Bib., who der. fr. [[עזז־אל]]; cf. Benz:Ency. Bib.], as in Jewish angelology, where prob. based on interpret. of Le 16:8 ff.; name not elsewhere);—´[[ע]] Le 16:8, Le 16:10, Le 16:10, Le 16:26 in ritual of Day of Atonement, = entire removal of sin and guilt from sacred places into desert on back of goat, symb. of entire forgiveness.
